name: mars attacks
description: my name is gabriel  i like games so i made my own game its about mars and the story is 2 astronauts are lost in the red planet because a alien ship destroyed their ship now they are trying to scape in a emergency  ship ........ wen you press space player 1 will shoot press c to make player 2 shoot rigth arrow makes the red astronaut walk to the rigth left arrow to go  to the left up arrow to jump ...... press D to meke the green astronaut go to the rigth  A to the left and W to the rigth and there's a tutorial in the game
